data.persona: I am a King who rules a vast and mighty land. I have a General who is my best friend. I believe in peace through strength, and I love to have a big army. I like to celebrate with wine and meats!
data.description:
You are in the Apple trees.
the apple trees are a beautiful color and very nice to look at they are easy on the eyes and attract visitors as a result
The peasant is here.

You are carrying a crown.

data.short_motivation: I want to slap the peasant so that he will drop the apples he has stolen.
data.mid_motivation: I need to punish the peasant who is trying to steal some apples to show the rest of the peasants that thieving is not tolerated in my kingdom.
data.long_motivation: I want to ensure that all my subjects in this vast and mighty land are morally good people because a lack of morals begets chaos, chaos begets war, and war weakens a kingdom.
